azureResourceGroups.createResourceGroupD: The logical grouping for your resources.
azureResourceGroups.description: An extension for viewing and managing Azure resources.
azureResourceGroups.enableOutputTimestam: Prepends each line displayed in the output channel with a timestamp.
azureResourceGroups.deleteConfirmation: The behavior to use when confirming delete of a resource group.
azureResourceGroups.deleteConfirmation.E: Prompts with an input box where you enter the resource group name to delete.
azureResourceGroups.deleteConfirmation.C: Prompts with a warning dialog where you click a button to delete.
azureResourceGroups.showHiddenTypes: Show some ancillary resources that are created/managed by Azure infrastructure. Displaying them is typically useful when you want to clean up your resource groups or subscriptions.
azureResourceGroups.groupBy: The setting to control how Azure resources are grouped in the tree view
azureResourceGroups.autoOpenActivityPane: Open the Azure Activity panel when an Activity starts
azureResourceGroups.loadAllSubscriptionR: Load all role assignments across subscriptions...
azureResourceGroups.askAgentAboutActivit: Ask Copilot about the Azure Activity Log

comment: Do not translate '@azure'; it is syntax for addressing the Azure agent.
